description: The demolition of the former Marvels Lane Boys Club, Balder Rise SE12 and dwelling at 41 Le May Avenue SE12 and the construction of 3 three storey blocks comprising 36 self-contained flats, with the main vehicular access off Le May Avenue.
site_name: MARVELS LANE BOYS CLUB, BALDER RISE, LONDON, SE12 9PF
